cab.content: SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION * NOON - 17th AUGUST, 1918.1. WESTERN FRONT *Between the ANCRE and the OISE fighting has taken place north and south of the AHIEHS - ROYE road, and progress has been made by the British and the French towards ROYE, In this neighbourhood the line not: runs as follows.- east of FRANSART, western outskirts of FRESNOY-LES-ROYES, eastern out. skirts of GCYENCOURT, western outskirts of ST. HARD, western outskirts of LAUCOURT, LAUCOURT^TILLOLOY ROAD - TILLOLOY, LE CESSIER, B0IS-DES-L0GESt Otherwise there is no change in the lino *During yesterday and last night our patrols had shavp fighting in the neighbourhood of V1EUX BERQUID!, where some progress has been made. Hostile artillery has been active about MOITT ROUGE and the SCHERPENBERG, and in the vicinity of ZILLEBEKE LAKE.2.
